metadata.name: Opening Gambit
metadata.description:
My Dear Collector,

You are cordially invited to the Monte Carlo Casino for an extravagant weekend of vice, play, and speculation. 

Imagine spending a decadent and extravagant stay in our luxurious suites, surrounded by the glamour of the 1920s. Indulge in the finest cuisine and drink, while immersing yourself in the timeless pleasure of games of chance. 

But there is more. We have a tantalizing proposition. 

We need your assistance in investigating the mystery of the man who broke the bank at Monte Carlo. The story of this elusive figure has captivated the public's imagination for the last half decade, and we believe you have the wit and charm to uncover the truth behind the legend.

Yours In Mystery,  
Hotel Concierge
